org.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN watchers ON watchers.watchable_id = issues.id AND watchers.watchable_type = "$1" WHERE watchers.user_id = 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN watchers ON watchers.watchable_id = issues.id AND watchers.watchable_type = "$1" WHERE watchers.user_id = 1 LIMIT 1
